name: 許益瑞
objective:
X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis. In the x-ray diffraction part, we will teach the fundamental scattering theory, space group, and basic crystallography. For polycrystalline materials, the Rietveld refinement will be used for powder x-ray diffraction data analysis. For soft mater like polymers, the XRD in combination with molecular modeling will be used to analysis the experimental XRD pattern. In the x-ray absorption part, the EXAFS data analysis method will be used to understand the local environment and bond length between absorbing metal and coordinated ligands.
schedule:
week 1   Introduction to basic scattering theory(I) 
week 2   Introduction to basic scattering theory(II)
week 3   Solid State (I) : crystallography
week 4   Solid State (II) : symmetry
week 5   Solid State (III) : x-ray diffraction theory(I)
week 6   Solid State (IV) : x-ray diffraction theory(II)
week 7   Powder X-ray data analysis : Rietveld Refinement (I)
week 8   Powder X-ray data analysis : Rietveld Refinement (II)
week 9   Structure Visualization and Molecular Building
week 10  Molecular Modeling and XRD analysis on polymer
week 11  Small angle x-ray scattering
week 12  X-ray absorption Spectroscopy (I) : XANES
week 13  X-ray absorption Spectroscopy (II) : EXAFS
week 14  EXAFS data analysis 
week 15  Practical (I)
week 16  Practical (II)
week 17  Practical (III)
week 18  Practical (IV)

2. Leonid V. Azaroff, Elements of X-ray Crystallography
3. Anthony R. West, Basic Solid State Chemistry, John Willey & Sons, Singapore, 1991. 
4. M. F. C. Ladd and R. A. Palmer, Structure Determination by X-ray Crystallography, 2nd ed., 1985. 
5. Jan Drenth, Principle of Protein X-ray Crystallography, Springer, 1994.
